#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int test;
	long long int n,m,k,ans,counter,val;
	scanf("%d",&test);
	while(test--)
	{
		ans=0,counter=0;
		scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&n,&k,&m);
		val=m/n;
		if(n>=m)
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
		else
		{
			while(val>0)
			{
				counter++;
				val=val/k;
			}
			printf("%lld\n",counter-1);
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
